sponsor: Neuropsychiatric Research Institute, Fargo, North Dakota
briefTitle: Effects of Gastric Bypass on Blood Levels of Duloxetine
officialTitle: A Preliminary Comparison of the Effect of Roux-en-Y Bariatric Surgery on Blood Levels of Duloxetine
summary: This study aims to determine the difference, if any, in the pharmacokinetics of duloxetine between patients who are nine to fifteen months post Roux-en-Y Bariatric Surgery and control subjects matched for body mass index (BMI), age and gender.
